title: Does Hackers steal special information by "what will you look like, Pissbook "?
subtitle: The viral warnings about "extremist pirates" stealing information through popular entertainment applications on Facebook are false and misleading.
author: David Emery
vclaim: :: Extremist hackers control people ' s personal information through links to websites that allow Facebook users to see their bald form, or as a member of the opposite sex, etc.
